page                  QWidget
  layout              QVBoxLayout
    layout            QHBoxLayout
      group           QGroupBox(my box)
        layout        QHBoxLayout
          label       QLabel(hello label)
          button      QPushButton(hello button)
    edit              QLineEdit(edit me)
    slider            QSlider
    split_page        QSplitter
      label1          QLabel(on the left)
      label2          QLabel(on the right)
    tabs              QTabWidget
      w1              QLabel(foo)
      w2              QLabel(bar)
      w3              QLabel(baz)
